name: Escape the Factory
description:
*This is our submission for the  Thinkable Jam*

Try to escape a few fun and mystery levels and puzzle your way out of the factory.

You play as a small engineer that developed a robot to help him do things. With his help he tries to escape the factory he has been kept for a long time.

Use the robots special abilities to solve the puzzles and find your way to freedom.

Controlls:

Moving the Engineer: WASD

Moving the Robot: Arrow Keys

Press Right-Shift to open the robots' menu and navigate through the menu with the arrow keys.

By touching a door you get to the next level.

You can also press "R" to restart your current level.

Have fun playing :)

!Please note that this was created for a game Jam and is in no way finished or polished, but we might find time after the jam to add new levels and fix bugs!
